status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Across the 6‑hour window the turbine remained in **Normal Operation** for all 37 ten‑minute intervals, with **very low and steady power output** (power_mean ≈ ‑0.0025, power_std ≈ 0.0011) under generally **low wind conditions** (wind_speed_mean ≈ 1.48, std ≈ 0.72), despite a brief wind spike to 8.0. Operationally, pitch averaged **~23.7°**, while drivetrain speed variability was modest at the rotor and higher at the generator (rotor_rpm_std ≈ 1.93; generator_rpm_std ≈ 220.9). The notable anomaly is a **persistently large yaw misalignment** (mean ≈ 103.2; tagged) alongside a **positive mean power residual** (~0.081).
